decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Unnumbered Location Plan. Received 13/06/2017
284 006 A 004 G; 284 006 A 003 G; 284 006 A 002 G; 284 006 A 001 G; 284 006 A 022 G. Received 09/02/2018
284 006 A 001 G. Received 25/01/2018) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No development shall take place until the details and specification of the recreated canopies located over the entrance doors as shown on the approved drawings (with particular regard to decorative brackets) and detailed 1:20 drawings of the position of the canopy are submitted and approved in writing by the local planning authority. Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.

Condition : 4 - No development shall take place until the details and specification of the recreated lintels located over the windows and detailed 1:20 drawings of the position of the lintels in relation to the windows at properties known as 13 Worple Avenue, 14 Worple Avenue, 15 Worple Avenue, 16 Worple Avenue, 41 Worple Avenue, 42 Worple Avenue, 43 Worple Avenue and 44 Worple Avenue, are submitted and approved in writing by the local planning authority. Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.

Condition : 5 - The insulated elevations of the buildings known as 13 Worple Avenue, 14 Worple Avenue, 15 Worple Avenue, 16 Worple Avenue, 41 Worple Avenue, 43 Worple Avenue shall be painted in RAL 1013 and shall remain such thereafter.

Condition : 6 - The insulated elevations of the buildings known as 42 Worple Avenue, 44 Worple Avenue, 38 Crane Avenue and 44 Crane Avenue shall be painted in RAL 9010 and shall remain such thereafter.
Condition : 7 - The insulated elevations of the buildings known as 53 Crane Avenue and 55 Crane Avenue shall be painted in RAL 1002 and shall remain such thereafter.
description: Application of external wall insulation to 38, 44, 53, 55 Crane Avenue, 13, 14, 15, 16, 41, 42, 43, 44 Worple Avenue
